class.name: JarTerrainDetail
class.brief_description: Defines specific decorative details placed on terrain, such as rocks or plants.
class.description: Extends [JarTerrainPopulator] to specify individual terrain decorations with their appearance and behavior, including density, mesh, material, and shadow properties.

members.member: Controls how densely this detail is placed on the terrain. Higher values mean more instances.
Material applied to the detail's mesh for rendering.
Maximum level of detail at which this detail will be rendered. Higher values allow rendering at farther distances.
Mesh used to render the detail object.
Determines whether shadows are cast by this detail object.
